The French language, like many Romance languages, has a complex system of gender agreement. This system affects not only pronouns and articles, but also adjectives and sometimes verbs. It is a common challenge for learners of French to master this system, as it often requires memorization of the gender of individual nouns. The French language also has a number of irregular verb conjugations, which can add another layer of difficulty for learners. What is the main challenge for learners of French as mentioned in the paragraph?
A. Gender agreement system
B. Irregular verb conjugations
C. Pronunciation
D. Vocabulary acquisition

The main challenge for learners of French mentioned in the paragraph is the gender agreement system. The paragraph states that the French language has a complex system of gender agreement that affects pronouns, articles, adjectives, and sometimes verbs. It also mentions that mastering this system is a common challenge for learners, as it often requires memorizing the gender of individual nouns. While irregular verb conjugations are also mentioned as adding another layer of difficulty, the primary focus of the paragraph is on the gender agreement system.因此，正确答案是A. Gender agreement system
